means: 服从，听从( obey的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: A policeman would not live one year if he obeyed these regulations.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察如果遵守这些规定的话，一年都活不了。

sentence.Network_en: Cissie obeyed her mother without question.
sentence.Network_cn: 茜茜对她母亲言听计从。

sentence.Network_en: She obeyed his instructions to the letter.
sentence.Network_cn: 她分毫不差地遵照他的吩咐去做。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Hermes immediately obeyed and glided down from the heavens to the earth ., 赫密斯立刻遵命 , 从天上飞到地面上.
mechanically I obeyed , turned eastwards , and with my cutlass raised , ran round the corner of the house . next moment I was face to face with Anderson .我机械地服从命令，举着弯刀向东绕过屋角，结果劈面碰上了安德森。
he is the master , and as such must be obeyed .他是主人就得服从他。
The men obeyed , as though it were the most ordinary thing in the world ., 这些人就照办了 , 仿佛这是世界上最简单的一件事.

list.abs: We must obey traffic regulations , I can ' t disobey ., 我们必须遵守交通规则 , 我不能违抗.

some technologies do indeed improve at such a predictable pace that they obey simple formulae such as Moore's law , which acts as a battle plan for the semiconductor industry .的确，有些技术的进步是以一种可预测的节奏进行着，他们遵循摩尔定律般简单的公式，好比是半导体工业的设计图纸。
You ought to obey your parents ., 你应服从你的父母.
I will hasten and not delay to obey your commands ., 60 我急忙遵守你的命令 , 并不迟延.
you must obey the traffic rules ., 你必须遵守交通规则.
virtual economy must obey and serve real economy ., 虚拟经济必须服从和服务于实体经济.

entry.def: If you obey a person, a command, or an instruction, you do what you are told to do.

example.ex: Cissie obeyed her mother without question...
example.tran: 茜茜对她母亲言听计从。

auth_sentence.content: Some of the passersby grumbled, but eventually obeyed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of the passersby grumbled, but eventually obeyed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some of the passersby grumbled, but eventually obeyed.

auth_sentence.content: Ryba reluctantly obeyed, but he was soon fired.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ryba reluctantly obeyed, but he was soon fired.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ryba reluctantly obeyed, but he was soon fired.

auth_sentence.content: But the rules were never fully obeyed by everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the rules were never fully obeyed by everyone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the rules were never fully obeyed by everyone.
